author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: A classic barbecue sauce is given a lift with the addition of bourbon, or whisky, for a deep, smoky flavour when grilled.
name: Bourbon & Brown Sugar Bbq Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together the ketchup, vinegar, bourbon, sugar, spices, and sea salt. Set aside some of the sauce for glazing and generously baste the chicken all over with the rest.

Cook the chicken under a mediumhot grill for 12-15 minutes on each side, or until cooked through, basting regularly. Alternatively, preheat the oven to 180oC and bake the chicken for 25-30 minutes, or until cooked through. Using a clean brush, baste the reserved sauce over the cooked chicken, and serve hot with Boston baked beans, spinach, and sweet corn cobs.
